name: TobaccoUseCessationCounseling
title: Tobacco Use Cessation Counseling
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for tobacco cessation counseling.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Intervention.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an intervention that may include referral to tobacco cessation-related services or providers, education about the benefits of stopping tobacco use, education about the negative side effects of using tobacco, and monitoring for tobacco cessation.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Smoking and tobacco use cessation counseling visit; intermediate, greater than 3 minutes up to 10 minutes
Smoking and tobacco use cessation counseling visit; intensive, greater than 10 minutes

contains.display: Smoking and tobacco use cessation counseling visit; intermediate, greater than 3 minutes up to 10 minutes
